page.title: 13FAMILY LIFE 2
page.content: {Mrs.Street}is our school practical assistant and has a family of four.Her children are now grown up. They tend to go places of interest and local ev- ents at weekends.She enjoys gardening and would like to see Puddletown improved with the building of the bypass .Their family like Puddletown a great deal. {Mrs.Lerpiniere}is one of our canteen assistants.She has 3 children,the oldest being 12 years old.The weekends are usually spent visiting relations or attending local athletic meetings where the eldest daughter competes. The family like living in Puddletown as it has a lot to offer young families.It is a peaceful location and yet it has good facilities.The building of a bypass would improve the village.
